title: Hostile Contact
description: When Symone is faced with a stranger infiltrating her life, she finds herself wondering who can she really trust? Much of the evidence is pointing to her best friend and a new man that's pursuing her, â€¦ leaving her confused and afraid. With the danger proving to be more serious than she had first believed, Symone has no choice but to put her trust in the one person she wanted nothing to do with.
author: Tamala Callaway
